snippet: It is rare for one brand's ad to feature another brand made by another company, but there were two examples during the Super Bowl: an apocalyptic Chevy spot featuring Twinkies and a commercial for General Electric that referred to Budweiser beer.
abstract: It is rare for one brand's ad to feature another brand made by another company, but there were two examples during the Super Bowl: an apocalyptic Chevy spot featuring Twinkies and a commercial for General Electric that referred to Budweiser beer.

headline.main: Chevy Uses  App and Twinkies to Stick Out at the Super Bowl
